name: PMH
tagline: The retail industry’s best kept secret.
description:
You may not know us, but you definitely know our work. Over the past 28 years, Peterson Milla Hooks (PMH) has been the independent creative agency behind the curtain for some of the most beloved retailers through all stages of their growth. Some even call us the retail industry’s best kept secret. We created the Target brand as the world knows it today.
And from there we’ve helped to inject fresh energy into retail brands like the Gap, Jet.com, Nine West, Sephora, BEHR, Fossil and Sleep Number, and continue to grow their relevancy in today’s retail environment. If you’re a fan of retail, we’d love to connect.
